Title: Windows Phone 7 Feedback Control
Description: Windows Phone user control for sending feedback directly from the application
HomeWiki:
Project Description

As simple as it sounds: reusable control for your app's users to send their feedback directly from your app.

You can set the basic properties, like static / editable subject line, default subject, default e-mail body text - and, of course, the e-mail address for the feedback to be sent to.
